name: Art For All_01
description:
“Art for all” is an AI generated artwork, based on a reinterpretation the the work of British artist and philosopher William Morris.

William Morris rejected the development of the ‘machine age’ and mass production of objects in the 19th Century, emphasising the importance of the hand of the artist. In Art for All, the machine itself becomes the artist. Trained on the entire oeuvre of William Morris, the AI is able to create entirely new designs. The ‘robot Morris’, unlike the human designer, can create an infinite images, forever. Rather than static wallpaper, the AI is able to create a constantly changing and evolving pattern. The concrete details of the human design are replaced by abstraction, and the colours intensified.
